column4: Hello! I have accidentally deleted my /etc/gdm directory on a freshly upgraded Jaunty. Could someone with a Jaunty non-modified gdm archive the contents of this folder for me please? Thank you very much
I have no gdm.conf file after a apt-get --reinstall install gdm
where are you looking for that file?
don't have access to a jaunty system right now to verify. You should file a bug.
